concept.title: Bird Songs
concept.abstract: The abstract is being used to provide more complex content. The shortdesc must be directly contained by the abstract. The abstract can put text around the shortdesc.

conbody.p: Bird songs vary widely among species, from simple songs that are genetically imprinted to complex songs that are learned over a lifetime.

example.p: Flycatchers know their songs from birth:

ul.li: Flycatcher songs are simple sequences of notes.
Flycatcher songs never vary but are unique to each member of the Flycatcher family.
